text: There are several lakes named Mud Lake within the U.S. state of Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Arkansas County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Arkansas County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Arkansas County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Ashley County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Calhoun County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Chicot County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Desha County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Hempstead County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Jefferson County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Lincoln County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Monroe County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Monroe County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, St. Francis County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Union County, Arkansas. * Mud Lake, Woodruff County, Arkansas. ==References== * USGS-U.S. Board on Geographic Names Category:Lakes of Arkansas
title: Mud Lake (Arkansas)
